run.summary: Completed zoox→reef migration and polyp→polip rename; designed polip-native changelog system via vendor introspection

what-worked.item: Migration script automated directory rename and import updates across 11 test files
Global find/replace for polyp→polip was safe due to internal Blob/Glob naming separation
Vendor introspection pattern: analyzed scriv/towncrier/git-cliff to cherry-pick best qualities
Design polip captures changelog research for future implementation without blocking current work

what-didnt.item: Initial migration script missed some test assertions expecting ET.ParseError vs ValueError
Had to manually fix 4 test files for new error wrapping behavior

next-session.step: Implement SessionStart hook for polip surfacing menu
When ready: implement changelog Phase 1 (CHANGELOG.md bootstrap)
